findings.title: vitest/vite moderate security vulnerabilities
findings.description: npm audit reveals 4 moderate severity vulnerabilities in the vitest/vite/esbuild dependency chain. CVE: GHSA-67mh-4wv8-2f99 allows cross-origin requests to development server.
findings.impact: Development environment security risk. Not production-affecting.
findings.recommendation: Upgrade vitest from ^1.x to ^4.0.17

findings.title: 'any' type usage in production code
findings.description: 6 instances of 'any' type in production (non-test) code, reducing type safety.
findings.impact: Reduced compile-time type checking, potential runtime errors.
findings.recommendation: Replace 'any' with proper types or 'unknown' with type guards.

findings.title: Excessive console.log in mycelium-bio production code
findings.description: 25+ console.log/console.error statements in mycelium-bio package that should use proper logging.
findings.impact: Unprofessional output, no log levels, no structured logging.
findings.recommendation: Implement logger abstraction or use observability package.

findings.title: integration-nexus-dep package too large
findings.description: At 14,262 LOC, integration-nexus-dep is 19% of all package code. May indicate multiple responsibilities.
findings.impact: Maintenance burden, potential hidden coupling.
findings.recommendation: Analyze for decomposition into smaller focused packages.

findings.title: query-parser.ts exceeds 600 lines
findings.description: Single file at 697 lines, indicating potential complexity.
findings.impact: Harder to maintain, understand, and test.
findings.recommendation: Consider extracting lexer, parser, and AST builder into separate modules.

findings.title: mycelium-bio under-tested
findings.description: 5160 LOC with only 2 test files and 117 test cases.

evidence.ratio: 5160 LOC / 2 test files = 2580 LOC per test file

findings.impact: Lower confidence in code correctness.
findings.recommendation: Add unit tests for individual modules.

findings.title: segment-engine under-tested
findings.description: 2999 LOC with only 1 test file and 56 test cases.
findings.impact: Critical text processing with limited test coverage.
findings.recommendation: Add comprehensive segmentation tests.

findings.title: aggregate-dna under-tested
findings.description: 1915 LOC with only 1 test file and 36 test cases.
findings.impact: Merkle tree aggregation with limited testing.
findings.recommendation: Add edge case and invariant tests.

findings.title: Isolated packages may miss integration opportunities
findings.description: 10 packages have no internal OMEGA dependencies (oracle, search, mycelium-bio, etc.)
findings.impact: Potential missed synergies, duplicated logic.
findings.recommendation: Review if oracle/search should integrate with genome for analysis.

findings.title: Multiple license types in packages
findings.description: Packages use PROPRIETARY, MIT, and UNLICENSED licenses inconsistently.
findings.impact: Legal clarity issues for consumers.
findings.recommendation: Standardize on single license or clearly document dual-licensing.

findings.title: Inconsistent package naming
findings.description: Some packages use @omega/ prefix, others don't (omega-bridge-ta-mycelium, omega-observability).
findings.impact: Inconsistent import paths, harder to discover packages.
findings.recommendation: Standardize all packages to @omega/ prefix.

findings.title: Silent error handling in mycelium-bio
findings.description: Multiple catch blocks in mycelium-bio/src/index.ts that silently catch and continue.
findings.impact: Errors may be swallowed without detection.
findings.recommendation: Log errors or use Result type pattern.

findings.title: No search timeout configuration
findings.description: @omega/search operations have no configurable timeout.
findings.impact: Long queries could block indefinitely.
findings.recommendation: Add optional timeout to search operations.

findings.title: Limited inline documentation in new packages
findings.description: oracle and search packages have minimal JSDoc comments.
findings.impact: Harder for new developers to understand API.
findings.recommendation: Add JSDoc to all public API functions.

findings.title: 4 gold-* packages for certification
findings.description: Certification spread across gold-cli, gold-internal, gold-suite, gold-master.
findings.impact: Potentially over-engineered, harder to navigate.
findings.recommendation: Consider consolidation or clearer documentation of boundaries.

findings.title: Frozen modules cannot evolve
findings.description: genome and mycelium are FROZEN, creating pressure for v2 if requirements change.
findings.impact: Any bug fix or feature requires new version with full recertification.
findings.recommendation: Document v2 migration path proactively.

findings.title: Version mismatch across packages
findings.description: Package versions range from 0.1.0 to 3.155.0 with no clear versioning strategy.
findings.impact: Unclear compatibility, confusing for consumers.
findings.recommendation: Document versioning strategy (mono-version vs independent).

findings.title: PowerShell-centric tooling
findings.description: 40 PowerShell scripts, limiting cross-platform development.
findings.impact: Linux/macOS developers need PowerShell or alternatives.
findings.recommendation: Add bash equivalents or use cross-platform scripting (tsx, node).

findings.title: No structured logging framework
findings.description: Uses console.log/console.error instead of structured logging.
findings.impact: No log levels, no structured output for log aggregation.
findings.recommendation: Implement or adopt lightweight logging abstraction.

findings.title: Large test files in integration-nexus-dep
findings.description: Test files over 600 lines: integration.test.ts (742), red-team.test.ts (671), e2e.test.ts (639).
findings.impact: Test execution time, harder to maintain.
findings.recommendation: Split into smaller focused test files.

findings.title: Extensive legacy directories
findings.description: Multiple OMEGA_PHASE*, OMEGA_MASTER_DOSSIER_*, and other legacy directories.
findings.impact: Confusing project structure, increased storage.
findings.recommendation: Archive to separate storage or document purpose.

findings.title: Inconsistent TypeScript versions
findings.description: Packages use TypeScript ^5.3.0, ^5.5.0, ^5.7.3 across different packages.
findings.impact: Potential type incompatibilities.
findings.recommendation: Standardize on single TypeScript version.

findings.title: Inconsistent @types/node versions
findings.description: @types/node versions range from ^20.0.0 to ^25.0.6.
findings.impact: Type definition mismatches possible.
findings.recommendation: Standardize on single @types/node version.

findings.title: No E2E tests outside omega-ui
findings.description: Only omega-ui has E2E tests in packages.
findings.impact: Integration across packages not tested end-to-end.
findings.recommendation: Add cross-package E2E test suite.

findings.title: CLAUDE.md references non-existent packages/sentinel
findings.description: CLAUDE.md structure diagram shows packages/sentinel but it exists at gateway/sentinel and OMEGA_SENTINEL_SUPREME/.

evidence.grep: packages/sentinel in CLAUDE.md but not in filesystem

findings.impact: Misleading documentation.
findings.recommendation: Update CLAUDE.md to reflect actual structure.

findings.title: No monorepo tooling
findings.description: 52 package.json files without workspaces configuration or monorepo tooling (nx, turborepo, lerna).
findings.impact: Manual dependency management, no shared build cache.
findings.recommendation: Consider implementing npm workspaces or turborepo.

findings.title: No bundle size analysis
findings.description: No evidence of bundle size monitoring for published packages.

evidence.search: No bundlesize, size-limit, or similar config found

findings.impact: Bundle bloat could go unnoticed.
findings.recommendation: Add bundle size checks to CI.

findings.title: No code coverage tooling configured
findings.description: vitest coverage not configured or results not tracked.

evidence.search: No coverage config in most vitest files

findings.impact: Coverage gaps not detected.
findings.recommendation: Enable vitest --coverage and track thresholds.

findings.title: omega-ui lacks state persistence
findings.description: Zustand stores are in-memory only, no persistence layer.
findings.impact: Application state lost on restart.
findings.recommendation: Add zustand persist middleware for user preferences.

findings.title: No CONTRIBUTING.md
findings.description: No contribution guidelines for external developers.
findings.impact: Harder for contributors to know standards.
findings.recommendation: Create CONTRIBUTING.md with development workflow.

findings.title: README.md is minimal
findings.description: Root README.md is only ~30 lines with minimal information.
findings.impact: Poor first impression, unclear project purpose.
findings.recommendation: Expand with architecture overview, getting started, etc.

findings.title: Two oracle implementations
findings.description: Both packages/oracle and src/oracle exist.
findings.impact: Confusion about which is canonical.
findings.recommendation: Document which is canonical, deprecate other.
